name: Draw Slasher: Dark Ninja vs Pirate Monkey Zombies
name_original: Draw Slasher: Dark Ninja vs Pirate Monkey Zombies
description:
TheAPPera.com: "Pirate Or Ninja, Either Way... This Game's Great!"

SlidetoPlay.com: "Gorgeous graphics and animation"

AppVee.com: "...has some of the coolest art I have seen in a game..."


************ "Draw Slasher" ************
"Draw Slasher" is an survival action game in which you take control of a cute ninja fighting against Pirate Monkey Zombies. These monsters invade your peaceful island, and you are the only one, who can stop them!

Slash through your enemies in style known from countless Japanese anime, and movies!

Cut off your opponents heads, hands, legs - whatever you want! Slash them to pieces and never stop the mayhem!

Hack your opponent and reappear behind his back. Do it over and over and make the biggest combo ever seen without being wounded once!

Features:
- Gameplay modes: survival, waves, hardcore, classic
- OpenFeint lederboards
- Dozens of achievements
- Opportunities to make unbelievable (100+) combos
- Black & white sketch graphics
- Lots of gore and cut off limbs!
- Easy, but fun fighting mechanics
- Pirate Monkey Zombies!


Expansion Pack features:
- New fighting arena (Sakura garden): Hack and slash in a garden covered by fallen Sakura petals

-Three survival modes: easy (15 stages), medium (30 stages), hard (45 stages). In each, you have to endure a certain number of levels. You can't replenish your health by standing still. Instead you get health points between stages. The more, and bigger combos you make, the more health you regain.
